title: Classes & Objects
concept: This level introduces object-oriented programming in Python: defining classes, instance attributes, methods, constructors (__init__), and simple encapsulation of logic inside objects.

challenges.title: Rectangle Class
challenges.description: Create a class Rectangle with attributes width and height. It should have a method area() that returns width * height. Read width and height, create object, print its area.

challenges.title: Student Class - Average
challenges.description: Create a class Student with name and three marks. It should have a method average() that returns average of marks. Read name and three integers, print integer average.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name, second line: three integers.

challenges.title: Counter Class
challenges.description: Create a class Counter with initial value 0. Methods: inc() increases by 1, dec() decreases by 1. Read N operations (inc/dec), apply on object and print final value.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N, next N lines: inc or dec.

challenges.title: Point Distance
challenges.description: Create class Point with x, y integers. Add method distance_from_origin() that returns distance from (0,0) as float (you can use (x**2 + y**2)**0.5). Read x,y and print distance.
challenges.outputDescription: Distance as float (you can print default Python float).

challenges.title: Static Method - Add
challenges.description: Create class MathOps with a static method add(a, b) that returns a+b. Read a,b and print MathOps.add(a,b).

challenges.title: Circle Class - Area
challenges.description: Create class Circle with radius. Method area() returns area using pi = 3.14. Read radius and print area.

challenges.title: Library of Books
challenges.description: Create class Book with title and pages. Create class Library that stores a list of Book objects. After reading N books, print total pages of all books.
challenges.inputDescription: First line N, then N lines with title and pages (title has no spaces).
